raw_body:
GUNASEKERA – DR ANANDA DIAS – passed away on the 28th March 2024. Beloved husband of Malini,​ loving father of Kapila,​ Kishani,​ Thanuja and Asela,​ grandfather of Manisha. May pay last respects at the Jayaratne Funeral Parlour from 10 a.m. on Saturday (Lotus Room),​ Borella. Cortege leaves at 3.00 p.m. on Sunday 31st March for Borella General Cemetery for Cremation. Tel. 0774886572 or 0775038207.
021897
